item.name: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)

section.description: The <OBJECT>.TOGGLE_FORMBROWSE() method switches between the Form and Browse views of the selected data. Note : The form or browse must be visible before using this method. Limitations: Desktop applications only.

section.title: Example
section.example: dim ptr as P ptr = form.load("Customer Information") ptr.show() ptr.Toggle_FormBrowse()
